mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT department_name FROM employees WHERE company_code = #{companyCode} ORDER BY department_name ASC

SELECT e.employee_no , e.employee_name , e.department_name , e.rank_name , r.rank_ranking FROM employees e JOIN rank r ON e.rank_name = r.rank_name AND e.company_code = r.company_code WHERE e.company_code = #{companyCode} AND e.department_name = #{departmentName} ORDER BY r.rank_ranking ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT doc_no , department_name , doc_name , doc_title , employee_name , rank_name , doc_status , create_date , appr_status , ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT d.doc_no , e.department_name , d.doc_name , d.doc_title , e.employee_name , e.rank_name , d.doc_status , d.appr_status , d.create_date FROM document d JOIN doc_access da ON d.doc_no = da.doc_no JOIN employees e ON d.employee_no = e.employee_no WHERE 1=1 AND da.company_code = #{docAccessVO.companyCode} AND da.employee_no = #{docAccessVO.employeeNo} AND (da.access_appr = 1 OR da.reference = 1) AND d.appr_status IN ('결재대기', '결재진행중')
AND d.doc_title LIKE '%' || #{criteria.docTitle} || '%'
AND e.employee_name LIKE '%' || #{criteria.writer} || '%'
AND TRUNC(d.create_date) >= TO_DATE(#{criteria.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TRUNC(d.create_date) <= TO_DATE(#{criteria.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY doc_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.pageNum} * #{criteria.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{criteria.pageNum} -1) * #{criteria.amount}
